
list-queues
***********


DESCRIPTION
===========

Returns a list of your queues.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws sqs list-queues
     [--queue-name-prefix <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--queue-name-prefix"  (string)
   A string to use for filtering the list results. Only those queues
   whose name begins with the specified string are returned.
